channel.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
Over the past year or so, I've experimented with various 317 through to 525 servers, but the only ones I could seem to get working properly were 317s. Recently, I've managed to get some 508s and 525s working, but I'm not quite sure if I'm changing the player rights correctly, because nothing happens upon login. Basically, from the main folder I go through one folder (it changes) into Characters > Main Save > Bob
In Bob, I change PlayerRights=0 to =3, save, log in and nothing happens. I tried compiling after but it still doesnt work. Am I doing this correctly?
Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2010, 08:10:56 pm[/size][hr]I looked at a tutorial where they said to edit your login.class, Mine was just jibberish so I opened login.java and found what he mentioned, changed the player rights to 2 but it still doesnt work.

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_Runes Diablo Runes
item.description:
@Diablo_Runes wrote:

player rights are:

Administrator=2
Moderator=1
Administrator is just like owner

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @0wn3r_k4t3 0wn3r k4t3
item.description:
@0wn3r_k4t3 wrote:

My way is. get giveadmin command. put it where normal players can give admin. give yourself admin than put it some where or delete it

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

And you have a Palidino base. Correct?

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:5, topic:325171”]No…

Not at all.

Login.java is for the OWNER
MainFile save is for players to make the rights.

I’ve been working with a 508 for a while now.
I’d think I would know.[/quote]

I have coded 14 508’s and have worked with them since the begining i think i would know to i currently run a server and all my mods and admins are pluged into the login.java.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

No…

Not at all.

Login.java is for the OWNER
MainFile save is for players to make the rights.

I’ve been working with a 508 for a while now.
I’d think I would know.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:3, topic:325171”]Go to Characters > MainSave > Find your character name > change rights to 2 for admin.

As for owner, change the name of the old owner in the Login.Java under the IO folder.[/quote]

Messing around with player files in a 508 can get your player reset, and you can do player right 1 or 2 in login.java so you can use to make a mod/admin.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Go to Characters > MainSave > Find your character name > change rights to 2 for admin.

As for owner, change the name of the old owner in the Login.Java under the IO folder.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Changing player rights [508]
item.dc:creator: @Rile0120 Rile0120
item.description:
@Rile0120 wrote:

You must go into the login.java and change them there search for the server owners name and change it to yours.

Read full topic
